AdminUpdateSettings   

Description 

Updates settings 

Pre condition 

1. Administrator is logged into the account 

Post Condition 

1. Settings are updated with new data. 

Basic Course of Action 

1. Administrator visits the update settings page 

2. Administrator enters the information to be updated 

3. Administrator clicks save on settings page 

4. System verifies new settings. 

5. Administrator accepts. 

6. System updates new settings. 

7.System displays page with new settings.

8. Use case ends.
